The following packages allow an application to communicate with, control and update the firmware of Zentri BLE devices.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.zentri.zentri_ble
zentri_ble handles the low level details of the BLE interface on Android.
com.zentri.zentri_ble_command
zentri_ble_command allows an application to execute ZentriOS BLE commands remotely.
com.zentri.zentri_ble_ota
zentri_ble_ota allows an application to perform an Over The Air(OTA) firmware update of Zentri BLE devices.

The following packages allow an application to communicate with, control and update the firmware of Zentri BLE devices. The libraries are a set and consist of:

  • zentri_ble - Low level BLE operations (required)
  • zentri_ble_ota - Over The Air(OTA) Zentri BLE firmware updates (optional)
  • zentri_ble_command - Control of Zentri BLE device functions (optional)

The zentri_ble library is required, but the ota and command libraries are optional. For example, if an application only needs ota functionality, zentri_ble_ota can be used without the command library. Similarly, if only the command interface is required, the command and ble libraries can be used without the ota library.

There are demo applications available to show how these libraries should be used to build your application. Contact Zentri at www.zentri.com for details.

OTA Usage

To use the OTA library, the application must provide a callback object that implements the OTACallbacks interface.

The following diagram shows the interaction between the user application and the zentri_ble_ota classes.

This diagram handles the basic case where the firmware does not contain changes to the OTA firmware. Zentri BLE version 2.0 included major changes to the OTA process, and requires a special update process. This process is called a transition update in the library.

If the onTransitionUpdateRequired callback is called, the target device has legacy firmware that needs a special intermediate image in order to update to the newer firmware.

The following diagram shows the full process including transition updates.

Transition updates are only required if your application must support updating the firmware of Zentri BLE devices that have pre-2.0 firmware. If this is not required then it will save you significant time and effort in getting your application to market.
